tool_description: A simple API that allows you to obtain the most common colours from an image url as well as how common each colour is
name: Prismatic
title: Prismatic

api_list.name: Get Common Colours
api_list.description: When passed an image url as a parameter, will return a json body with the most common colours in the image with how common each colour occurs. The total number of pixels in the image is also returned
